DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy dactinomycin patient persistent recurrent low-risk gestational trophoblastic neoplasia . - Determine toxicity drug patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive dactinomycin IV 15 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 2 week absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve normal beta-human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) receive 2 additional course attain normal beta-HCG . Patients follow every 2 week 2 month monthly 10 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 15-35 patient accrue study within 18-42 month .
